comments.html: One could run L2 mac forced-forwarding (protected ports, private VLAN edge, whatever you want to call it) with "ip local proxy-arp" and "ipv6 nd prefix no-onlink." This forces all traffic through the first-hop router. This protects from rogue DHCP and RA.
